text: I muli di talitali nia ngadau e ono, tangada hai mee dabu Jehoiada gu hagamaanadu bolo di madagoaa e hagangalungalua nia mee. Mee guu hai dana hagababa gi nia dagi dauwa dogo lima: Azariah tama daane a Jeroham, Ishmael tama daane a Jehohanan, Azariah tama daane a Obed, Maaseiah tama daane a Adaiah, mo Elishaphat tama daane a Zichri.
